alert.note: Alert for Northern Lake County; Southern Lake County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 7:27PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Lake County through 800 PM EDT... At 727 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Lake Harris, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Leesburg, Tavares, Howey-In-the-hills, Lake Harris and Astatula. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern Lake County; Southern Lake County
